branch.title: Let’s meet in person
branch.detail: Do you have any questions? Call our Helpline or visit one of our branches

noPhone.title: What is your contact phone number?
noPhone.detail: To continue, we need your phone number. Please add it with the bank where you have your Bank Identity, then continue your card application.

general.title: Something went wrong, our apologies
general.detail: Unfortunately, we can’t continue right now. Please try again in a moment.

invalidToken.title: Unknown QR code
invalidToken.detail: Please make sure you’re scanning the correct QR code and try again.

contractDisagree.title: Do you have any questions?
contractDisagree.detail: Call us or visit your nearest branch.

cancelledExpire.title: The request for a new card has been canceled
cancelledExpire.detail:
Since you did not complete the verification within 7 days, we have canceled your request.
To submit a new card application, please contact the account owner.

cancelledHolder.title: The request for a new card has been canceled
cancelledHolder.detail: To submit a new card application, please contact the account owner.

invalidData.title: Please check the details in the invitation and try verifying again
invalidData.detail:
It’s possible your details don’t match the information provided. Please ask the person who invited you to review them.

If it still doesn’t work, please book an appointment at a branch and come in together. We’ll be happy to help you complete the process.

alreadyExists.title: The verification process has been started on another device
alreadyExists.detail: Please use said device to finish it

start.title: Cardholder verification

bulletsExistingUser.title: Fill in the remaining details for the new card
We’ll send the card once the account owner confirms it

bulletsAcquisitionUserBankId.title: Sign in using your existing account with another bank
Verify your identity
bulletsAcquisitionUserBankId.description: In the final step, we’ll confirm it’s really you and no one is impersonating you.

start.bulletsTitleAcquisitionUserDetails: Complete details and send the card

bulletsAcquisitionUserDetails.title: Fill in the remaining details for your new card and sign the application
We’ll send the card once the account owner confirms it

deliveryAddress.title: Address for card delivery
deliveryAddress.changeAddressInfo: If you’re our client, you can update your address in Settings under “About me.”

staticDocuments.title: Review the pre-contractual information
staticDocuments.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka, Internet Banka under ‘Document’ as well as in your email.

scoring.title: Just a moment, processing.
scoring.detail: It will only take a minute.

needsAnalysis.title: Review the insurance documentation
needsAnalysis.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka and Internet Banka uder ‘Documents’
needsAnalysis.agree: By clicking ‘Continue’ I confirm that I have reviewed the documents

contract.title: Review the Cardholder Agreement
contract.detail: All documents can be found in Smart Banka, Internet Banka under ‘Document’ as well as in your email.

victoryPlastic.title: Almost done — just the signatures left
victoryPlastic.detail: Once the request is approved by all approvers, we’ll send you the card.

victoryVirtual.title: Almost done — just the signatures left
victoryVirtual.detail: Once the request is approved by all approvers, you’ll be able to add your virtual card to your phone.
